column4: how could i return my starting  services (at boot) to their defaults?
please help me. How could i return my starting  services (at boot) to their defaults? I run Ubuntu Hardy
im not sure about resetting to default, but do you have another ubuntu install that you could use to compare services with?
when i reboot OR halt my system it appears very times (loop) a message like : main daemon: Got SIGABRT. Something went very wrong. Going down!
